#summary excerpt(text,phrase[excerptString,radius])
#labels api,0.8,view,helper

*Description*:

Extracts an excerpt from text that matches the first instance of phrase.

*Return Type*:

String

*

*Parameters*:

||   || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *text* || string || true ||  || The text to extract an excerpt from. ||
|| *excerptString* || string || false || ... || String to replace first and/or last characters with. ||
|| *radius* || numeric || false || 100 || Number of characters to extract surronding the phrase. ||
|| *phrase* || string || true ||  || The phrase to extract. ||



*Examples*:

{{{
#excerpt(text="Wheels is a framework for ColdFusion", phrase="framework", radius=5)#
-> ...is a framework for ...

}}}
